name: mobile-devices-market
description: 1. Create a simple web site for buying mobile devices 	* Create the following pages and put them into nav 		* Home -> contains greeting and site information 		* Smart phones -> contains a list of smartphones 		* Tablets -> contains a list of tablets 		* Wearables -> contains a list of wearables 	* All pages must have the same header, navigation and footer 	* Use Jade and Jade Layouts 	* Use the `each` directive to create the navigation
author: me
